## DataView.isValid() method

Gets a value indicating if the dataView is valid. When valid, the contents of the dataView can be accessed using getAllRows or getIterator. When not valid, use getError to get a description of the issue.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isValid(): Promise<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<boolean>`
